attributes.action: to sack the Foreign Secretary David Miliband as his Duty of Care, as an MP,  towards the British Public who emply him has not been met
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to sack the Foreign Secretary David Miliband as his Duty of Care, as an MP,  towards the British Public who emply him has not been met, in that he has further increased the risk of Britain becoming a Target of Terrorist Attack in his 'vetoeing' the first two UN Resolutions demanding an immediate ceasefire to Israel's offensive War against Gaza, not immediately demanding an end to Britain's diplomatic relations with Israel and at the beginning of the conflict refusing to call for a cancellation of the proposed co-operation agreement with Israel. This is no time for a Novice or Intellectual and Political Lightweight at the head of the Foreign Office.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
